alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:55PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Las Animas County through 445 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles west of Kim to 9 miles northeast of Trinchera. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
